tool_description: We are now hosted on PostMan : https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/3283093/SW7aXT2M?version=latest
name: Sagenda v3
title: Sagenda v3

api_list.name: List
api_list.description: A list of bookable items associated with supplied authentication token (account)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sagenda-sagenda-v3-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v3/bookableItems"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sagenda-sagenda-v3-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Authentication status
api_list.description: You can use this endpoint to check whether your authentication token is valid. Responds with HTTP 200, API version and list of available claims for a token (for reference)
api_list.code:

api_list.name: API status
api_list.description: Receive an API status. Responds with HTTP 200 OK and API version in body if functional
api_list.code:

api_list.name: Get specific event information
api_list.description: Returns a single event object containing all the booking information.

required_parameters.name: eventIdentifier
required_parameters.description: Unique event identifier from booking or event search

api_list.name: Events for item by date range
api_list.description: Returns an array of events that start in the date range between startDate and endDate (inclusive) for given bookable item

required_parameters.name: startdate
required_parameters.description: Start of date range (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DD (e.g 2018-03-17)

required_parameters.name: enddate
required_parameters.description: End of date range (inclusive). Format: YYYY-MM-DD (e.g 2018-03-17). Format: YYYY-MM-DD (e.g 2018-03-17)

api_list.name: Get bookings information
api_list.description: This endpoint lets you request detailed booking information for a given period of time, optionally filtered by bookable item and status.

optional_parameters.name: itemId
optional_parameters.description: Filter bookings by bookable item ID
